products.description: This fresh farmed Atlantic salmon fillet comes from Canada. Farmed salmon is a healthy and nutritious food. It is an oily fish particularly rich in omega 3, which is beneficial for cardiovascular health. It is also a good source of high-quality protein, vitamin D and calcium. Health Canada recommends eating at least two servings of oily fish per week as part of a balanced diet.
products.ingredients: (SALMO SALAR) PROVENANCE: CANADA. METHOD: FARM RAISED, OPEN ENVIRONMENTAQUACULTURE.

Ing: POLLOCK, WATER, WHEAT STARCH, SORBITOL, LIQUID EGG-WHITES, SUGAR,POTATO STARCH, MIRIN WINE (RICE, WATER, SAKE YEAST, SUGAR, SALT),SOYBEAN OIL, SALT, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVOUR, POTASSIUM CHLORIDE,SODIUM PHOSPHATES, COLOUR. (GADUS CHALCOGRAMMUS) ORIGIN: NORTHEASTPACIFIC, ALASKA. FISHING TYPE: WILD, TRAWL..***CONTAINS: POLLOCK, WHEAT,EGGS, SOY AND CRAB.
